glsa.title: Python: PCRE Integer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability within Python's copy of PCRE might lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Python is an interpreted, interactive, object-oriented programming language.

description.p: Python 2.3 includes a copy of PCRE which is vulnerable to an integer overflow vulnerability, leading to a buffer overflow.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by tricking a vulnerable Python application to compile a regular expressions, which could possibly lead to the execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service or the disclosure of sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Python 2.3 users should upgrade to the latest version:
